entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
